[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
A land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere.
I, II – You gain 3 life.
Deed – When you complete this deed, choose up to one target creature.
The chosen creature gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard and has hexproof.
